short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps summarize articles and webpages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View summary easily as you browse the web.

Highlight or right-click on a section of text and click on Summer icon next to it to summarize it.

**Summer utilize the power of ChatGPT. Before use, please obtain an API Key from OpenAI and save it in Summer. If you don't have one, you can get it here (https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys).
